## a.combine() function

The interface for merging up to 50 schemas into a single API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function combine<Schema extends GenericModelSchema<any>[]>(schemas: [...Schema]): CombinedModelSchema<Schema>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  schemas | \[...Schema\] | The schemas to combine into a single API |

**Returns:**

CombinedModelSchema&lt;Schema&gt;

An API and data model definition to be deployed with Amplify (Gen 2) experience (`processSchema(...)`<!-- -->) or with the Amplify Data CDK construct (`@aws-amplify/data-construct`<!-- -->)
